author: Ryan Lestoncontributor
title: Jeepers Creepers 3 has begun filming
text: – Star Wars Clumsy Stormtrooper Has Died Of course, Gina Philips starred in the original ‘Jeepers Creepers’… and now it looks as though the character will be taking on The Creeper once more, as she tries to ensure her son will be safe. “Trish Jenner is now a mother of a teenage son named Darry, named after the brother she lost 23 years ago,” they reveal. “Trish has a recurring nightmare where her son suffers the same fate as her brother did, killed by the Creeper. Determined to prevent this from happening, Trish, who is now a rich and powerful woman, sets out on a final quest with Jack Taggart Sr. and Jr. to end the Creeper’s reign of terror once and for all. The Creeper fights back in gory glory as its enemies grow closer than ever before to learning the secret of its dark origins.” The original ‘Jeepers Creepers’ appeared in 2001, marking the return of the creature feature. View photos Gina Philips returns for the sequel – Credit: United Artists More Starring Jonathan Breck as a hideous monster who appears every 23 years to harvest body parts from unsuspecting victims, it became an instant hit, earning $60 million worldwide from a budget of $10 million. But can ‘Jeepers Creepers 3’ bring the franchise back from the dead? It’s certainly a promising start to see fan favourite Gina Philips back for the third instalment… and by teaming her up with the Taggarts from ‘Jeepers Creepers 2’, it certainly taps into the best of both movies. But for now, we’ll have to wait and see. ‘Jeepers Creepers 3’ stars Gina Philips alongside Jonathan Breck as The Creeper. Victor Salva will direct the film based on his own script.
